official_title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XIX of such Act to discourage persons from moving to a State to obtain greater amounts of aid to families with dependent children or additional medical assistance under State medicaid plans.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XIX (Medicaid) of such Act to set limits on AFDC and Medicaid benefits for individuals moving interstate.

titles.title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act and title XIX of such Act to discourage persons from moving to a State to obtain greater amounts of aid to families with dependent children or additional medical assistance under State medicaid plans.
